sent.orig: Beautiful, beautiful, Jesus is beautiful, and Jesus makes beautiful things of my life.
sent.trans: 多美好，多美好，耶稣何等美好，我生命被祂改变成为美好。

sent.orig: A beautiful form is better than a beautiful face; a beautiful behavior than a beautiful form.
sent.trans: 美丽的外形胜于美丽的脸蛋，美丽的举止胜于美丽的外形。

sent.orig: Modeling can only be used on a beautiful, very beautiful, too beautiful like the terms now.
sent.trans: 造型上只能用漂亮、很漂亮、太漂亮了之类的词语来形容。

sent.orig: Some had beautiful eyes, others beautiful nose, others a beautiful mouth and figure.
sent.trans: 有的美目流盼，有的鼻准端心，有的樱唇巧美，有的身材苗条。

sent.orig: A beautiful setting encourages beautiful thoughts. And beautiful thoughts lead you in a positive direction.
sent.trans: 美好的框架会引导你有一个美好的愿景，美好的愿景会带领你走向积极的方向。
